mapper.select: select idx, lineIntro, posblFcltyCl, themaEnvrnCl, firstImageUrl, doNm, sbrsEtc, sigunguNm, zipcode, lctCl, sbrsCl, addr1, addr2, facltNm, homepage, resveUrl, induty, mapX, mapY, homepage, animalCmgCl from camp_info where induty like '%일반야영장%' limit 1, 10

select idx, lineIntro, posblFcltyCl, themaEnvrnCl, firstImageUrl, doNm, sbrsEtc, sigunguNm, zipcode, lctCl, sbrsCl, addr1, addr2, facltNm, homepage, resveUrl, induty, mapX, mapY, homepage, animalCmgCl from camp_info where idx = #{idx}

select idx, lineIntro, posblFcltyCl, themaEnvrnCl, firstImageUrl, doNm, sbrsEtc, sigunguNm, zipcode, lctCl, sbrsCl, addr1, addr2, facltNm, homepage, resveUrl, induty, mapX, mapY, homepage, animalCmgCl from camp_info where induty like '%자동차야영장%'

select idx, lineIntro, posblFcltyCl, themaEnvrnCl, firstImageUrl, doNm, sigunguNm, zipcode, lctCl, addr1, addr2, facltNm, homepage, resveUrl, induty, mapX, mapY, homepage, animalCmgCl from camp_info where induty like '%글램핑%'

select idx, lineIntro, posblFcltyCl, themaEnvrnCl, firstImageUrl, doNm, sigunguNm, zipcode, lctCl, addr1, addr2, facltNm, homepage, resveUrl, induty, mapX, mapY, homepage, animalCmgCl from camp_info where induty like '%카라반%'

select idx, lineIntro, posblFcltyCl, themaEnvrnCl, firstImageUrl, doNm, sigunguNm, zipcode, lctCl, addr1, addr2, facltNm, homepage, resveUrl, induty, mapX, mapY, homepage, animalCmgCl from camp_info where facltNm like concat('%',#{searchText},'%') and doNm like concat('%',#{searchType},'%') and sigunguNm like concat('%',#{searchType2},'%')
and animalCmgCl like concat(#{animalCheck},'%')
and animalCmgCl like '불가능'
limit #{startNo}, #{pageSize}

select count(idx) from camp_info where facltNm like concat('%',#{searchText},'%') and doNm like concat('%',#{searchType},'%') and sigunguNm like concat('%',#{searchType2},'%')
and animalCmgCl like concat(#{animalCheck},'%')
and animalCmgCl like '불가능'
select count(*) from camp_info where induty like '%일반야영장%'
select count(*) from camp_info where induty like '%자동차야영장%'
select count(*) from camp_info where induty like '%카라반%' or induty like '%글램핑%'
